title: AP PHOTOS on Day 38: Retreating troops leave devastation - The Associated Press - en Español
content:
1. AP PHOTOS on Day 38: Retreating troops leave devastation  The Associated Press - en Español
  2. Russia-Ukraine war news: Live updates  The Washington Post
  3. Russia-Ukraine war: what we know on day 38 of the Russian invasion  The Guardian
  4. AP PHOTOS on Day 37: Remnants of fighting left behind  The Associated Press - en Español
  5. Russian retreat exposes dead bodies in Bucha, outside Kyiv  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: In the Kyiv suburb of Bucha, civilians cheer as a convoy arrives bringing aid, including food, to an area that had been occupied by Russian troops. A Ukrainian soldier checks the body of a man dressed in civilian clothes for possible booby traps left by retreating Russian forces.
